whatIsService.title: What Is Wart Removal Treatment?
whatIsService.content:
Wart removal treatment is a medical procedure designed to safely eliminate warts - small, benign skin growths caused by the human papillomavirus (HPV). Warts can appear anywhere on the body and may be unsightly, uncomfortable, or interfere with daily activities.

Whether you have common warts on hands, plantar warts on feet, or facial warts, professional removal ensures complete elimination while minimizing scarring and preventing recurrence.

At The Skin Firm, our wart removal treatments use advanced medical techniques to safely remove warts of all types and sizes. Under the expert care of Dr. Karishma Singh, we ensure effective treatment with minimal discomfort and optimal healing.

items: Rough, raised bumps on hands or feet

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Wart Removal Treatment at The Skin Firm?
whyChooseUs.content:
Dealing with warts can be frustrating and embarrassing. Over-the-counter treatments often fail, and warts may continue to spread or become more bothersome over time.

At The Skin Firm, our professional wart removal treatments provide definitive solutions that eliminate warts completely while preventing recurrence. We use proven medical techniques that are both safe and effective.

Under the expert guidance of Dr. Karishma Singh, trusted dermatologist in Pune, we ensure proper diagnosis, appropriate treatment selection, and complete wart elimination with minimal scarring.

faqs.title: FAQs on Wart Removal Treatment in Pune

questions.question: Is wart removal treatment painful?
questions.answer: Most wart removal procedures involve minimal discomfort. We use appropriate pain management techniques, and any discomfort is typically brief and manageable.

questions.question: Will the wart come back after removal?
questions.answer: When properly removed by a dermatologist, warts rarely recur at the same location. However, new warts may develop elsewhere if exposed to HPV again.

questions.question: How long does it take for the area to heal?
questions.answer: Healing typically takes 1-2 weeks, depending on the removal method and wart size. Complete skin restoration may take several weeks.

questions.question: Are there any scars after wart removal?
questions.answer: When performed by experienced dermatologists using proper techniques, scarring is minimal. Dr. Karishma Singh uses methods that preserve healthy skin appearance.

questions.question: Can all types of warts be removed?
questions.answer: Yes, we can safely remove all types of warts including common warts, plantar warts, flat warts, and filiform warts using appropriate techniques.
